writer.name: 桑蒂·罗德里格斯 Xanti Rodriguez

director.name: 桑蒂·罗德里格斯 Xanti Rodriguez

introduction: Lekaime is a project born in the studios of Xanti Rodríguez, a short film set in the 40s after Hitler's visit Franco in Hendaye. Title of fantastic terror surrounded by occultism, black magic and touching the controversy of the theft of neonates by a part of a small ecclesiastical collective. The main character is formed by Oihana Maritorena who will play Maria a dazed mother who wakes up in the middle of a forest. Amaia Lizarralde will give life to Rufina, director of the Basque boarding school for pregnant women. On the other hand, Asier Hernández as General Espinosa, a narcissistic, patriotic and devout man.
